content.rendered:
Hello. This is the FOSS4G-Asia Seoul team.
We would like to introduce our platinum sponsor, LT Metric.
LT Metric has established a collaborative platform among businesses through the “Spatial Information Service Alliance,”
connecting the entire process from spatial information production to service provision.
The company aims to create value from data.
We appreciate LT Metric’s sponsorship and look forward to your interest in FOSS4G-Asia 2023 Seoul, where we come together through spatial information.
